model.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "app.groundskeeper.jobs.data-write.ready" WHERE "customer" = 'bison' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

alert.message: Sayers / bison job queue is rising.
alert.name: Sayers / bison Job Queue Alert

targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "app.groundskeeper.jobs.data-query.ready" WHERE "customer" = 'bison' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "app.lineup.jobs" WHERE "customer" = 'bison' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") FROM "app.groundskeeper.threats.estimating" WHERE "customer" = 'bison' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

alert.message: Whitelisted data flow has stopped on Sayers / bison.
